COLECALCIFEROL

VITAMIN D AND ANALOGUES (SYSTEMIC)

  • Indications and doses
  • Cautions
  • Monitoring requirements
  • Medicinal forms

Indications and doses

Prevention of vitamin D deficiency,

By mouth

  • For adults
    400 units daily.

Treatment of vitamin D deficiency,

By mouth

  • For adults
    800 units daily, higher doses may be necessary for severe deficiency.

Cautions regarding administration

  • Take care to ensure correct dose in infants

Monitoring requirements

Patient parameters

Monitor plasma-calcium concentration in patients receiving high doses.

Prepared medicinal forms of COLECALCIFEROL

There can be variation in the licensing of different medicines containing the same drug.

Forms available from special-order manufacturers include: tablet, oral suspension, oral drops, oral solution, capsule,
Tablet
Chewable tablet
Orodispersible tablet
Capsule
Oral solution
Oral drops
Not applicable
